effects: Physical damage (2x, ATK) to one enemy

Gain access to following skills:
	Snap Punch+1 (704230)
Increase ATK by 65% for 8 turns to caster
Reduce ATK by 40% for 8 turns to one enemy
name: Twin Snakes

desc_short.0: Damage and reduce ATK for one enemy, boost own ATK, and enable snap punch to be used once
desc_short.5: Daña y reduce el ATQ de un enemigo, aumenta el ATQ del usuario y puede usar Puño resquebrajador una vez
